feed.title: GitHub Erlang Monthly Trending
feed.subtitle: Monthly Trending of Erlang in GitHub

entry.title: emqx/emqx
entry.summary: An open-source, cloud-native distributed MQTT broker for IoT.

entry.title: dgiot/dgiot
entry.summary: Open source platform for IoT,30 min Quick Deployment,10M devices connection,Carrier level Stability;物联网开源平台,30分钟快速部署,千万级承载,电信级稳定性. Low code for Object model-Rule Engine-Data Channel-Configuration Page; Fully open source, Multi industrial protocols are compatible.物模型-规则引擎-数据通道-组态页面全流程零代码开发、前后端完全开源、多行业工业协议兼容。
